= step by step deployment djwiki on mysql =

  # install mysql
  # create database for djwiki 
    {{{mysql\bin\mysqladmin.exe -u login -ppswd create djwiki}}}
  # dump current db 
    {{{manage.py dumpdata > wiki.json}}}
  # change settings.py
    {{{
    ...
      DATABASE_ENGINE = 'mysql' 
      DATABASE_NAME = 'djwiki'
      DATABASE_USER = 'login'             
      DATABASE_PASSWORD = 'pswd'       
      DATABASE_HOST = 'localhost'     
      DATABASE_PORT = '3306'  
    ...
    }}}
  # create tables in mysql db
    {{{manage.py syncdb}}}
  # load data from dump
    {{{manage.py loaddata wiki.json}}}
  # run the server
    {{{manage.py runserver}}}
  # *have fun*
